PRIME

mdance.prime.sim_calc

mdance.prime.rep_frames

This script aims to find the representative frame for each method below.

mdance.cli.prime_sim

in scripts/prime directory python ../../src/mdance/cli/prime_rep.py -m union -s outputs -d normed_clusters -t 0.1 -i SM python ../../src/mdance/cli/prime_sim.py -m union -n 6 -i SM -t 0.1 -d normed_clusters -s ../nani/outputs/summary_6.csv
